Work

EEGO

VISUAL COLLECTIONS OF MULTIMEDIA & RESOURCES

Eego helps designers collect and organize resources for their workflow. Instantly create visual collections of inspiration, videos and websites that embed directly on the page.

VUMBLE

THE LEADERBOARD FOR ONLINE VIDEO

Vumble is a faster, easier way for viewers to enjoy the best videos from across Reddit. Every day, users submit clips and vote the best ones to the top. No ads or interruptions.

RAINBOW

DISCOVER MUSIC YOUR FRIENDS LIKE

A web and soon to be mobile app that helps people discover what their friends are liking on Soundcloud.

HUMBLE.VC

A BETTER APPROACH TO VENTURE CAPITAL

Redesigned & developed a new site for a venture capital firm with ties to Sony and Ogilvy. Built in wordpress for accessible client CMS.

ACTIVITY SHEET

A DAILY PRODUCTIVITY JOURNAL

My friends and I are documenting our daily productivity to hold ourselves accoutable for building every day. Join us and build one!
